attributes.action: Reconsider the Covid vaccine mandate for front line NHS workers
attributes.additional_details: With more than 103 thousand NHS staff unvaccinated this cannot be ignored. We want a reconsideration.The reasons why individuals do not want to be vaccinated are not heard. Human rights are not being heard. No jab no job
attributes.background: I want to start a petition to obtain signatures to take to the house of commons. So that our voices can be heard.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996
